subjectDescription: Discover a full suite of online business courses that will allow you to make better business decisions and succeed in today's competitive business world. Our courses provide a rich learning experience that will allow you to develop critical business skills in areas such as business... Read more...
title: Basics of Business Development
headline: Learn the basics of business development and become a strategic executive by signing up for this free online course.
description: If you wish to pursue a profession in business development, knowing business processes can help you grasp the tactics and skills you require. All the fundamentals of strategic business, such as planning, demand forecasting, procurement and supply chain management, are covered in detail. Hone your abilities as a team leader by studying negotiation techniques, effective communication and other administrative tasks.

courseDescription:
‘Business development’ represents the ideas, efforts and activities that assist a firm to thrive. This term includes increasing revenue, expanding the business, forging strategic alliances and making strategic business decisions. To improve these business development skills and become a professional in this field, you need to find out what the company and its competitors want so you can form a better picture of the target market.

This course explores the world of investment and development. It requires no prior experience or certifications and all academic levels are welcome. We start by learning about company planning, forecasting operations, and supply chains, then move on to specialised information such as business analysis and monitoring standards. People who want to run a business need to learn business and marketing skills to help them grow. Company expansion helps CEOs fulfil goals and address problems. The same holds for heads of departments, agencies, states and regions.

How crucial is corporate development? How do you succeed? Do not panic. We will cover all the fundamentals of how to manage a profitable business. By the end of the course, you will have acquired management abilities to lead your team and negotiate by practising communication skills, including those that will help you become an outstanding business administrator. With this expertise under your belt, you may broaden your job search to include fields like administration, accounting, finance, mentoring and more. Even with its hurdles, company expansion is a promising career path. Join this free online course!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module discusses the business aspects of company structure, succession, planning, processes, and content management. Study how monitoring improves internal controls and the supply chain. Also, learn how vital it is to determine what clients need so you can strategically give them solutions while growing your business.
topics: Knowledge of Business Re-Engineering and Supply Chain
Learning Acquisition, Purchase, and Project Planning

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module teaches techniques and guidelines to boost your employability. You'll learn crucial principles to evolve into a great leader. Then you'll learn to use the cost-benefit analysis for examining solutions. Also, you will discover leadership skills that will help you achieve your professional goals and become a better administrator.
topics: Tips to Become a Better Administrator

topics: Basics of Business Development - Course Assessment

slides:
• Learning Outcomes

  • After finishing this module, you will be able to:
    • Describe the processes and structure of the supply chain
    • Outline the differences between procurement and purchasing management
    • Explain the conceptualisation of business re-engineering
    • Identify the stages associated with business project management
    • Indicate the benefits of developing a competent business model

  • Lesson Summary

    • Business development is the process of improving a company's operations.
    • SWOT measures a company's performance, competition, risk, and potential.
    • Succession planning includes several business disciplines to ensure a smooth transfer. If done wrong, the business's worth might drop.
    • Good BPM boosts productivity and consumer feedback. When changing Business Process Management, use re-engineering to get the most remarkable results.
    • Forecasting estimates without all the necessary facts. It helps with planning, scheduling, and risk mitigation.Aggregate planning develops, analyses, and maintains a projected operations schedule.
    • Credit risk management aims to limit losses despite inefficiencies in data administration, duplication, poor risk instruments, and inaccurate reporting.
    • Procurement ensures cost-effective products and resources and maximises profit.
    • Purchase management is in charge of buying connections and operations. It's about maximising value.
    • Logistics is varied and complicated. Logistics design includes the organisation's origin, company culture, cost, and supply chain.
    • A project is a group of actions having a specified starting point and finish. It also has a clear objective and resources. As long as it fulfils stakeholder requirements, a project is successful.

  • Lesson Summary

    • Business development is the process of improving a company's operations.
    • SWOT measures a company's performance, competition, risk, and potential.
    • Succession planning includes several business disciplines to ensure a smooth transfer. If done wrong, the business's worth might drop.
    • Good BPM boosts productivity and consumer feedback. When changing Business Process Management, use re-engineering to get the most remarkable results.
    • Forecasting estimates without all the necessary facts. It helps with planning, scheduling, and risk mitigation.Aggregate planning develops, analyses, and maintains a projected operations schedule.
    • Credit risk management aims to limit losses despite inefficiencies in data administration, duplication, poor risk instruments, and inaccurate reporting.
    • Procurement ensures cost-effective products and resources and maximises profit.
    • Purchase management is in charge of buying connections and operations. It's about maximising value.
    • Logistics is varied and complicated. Logistics design includes the organisation's origin, company culture, cost, and supply chain.
    • A project is a group of actions having a specified starting point and finish. It also has a clear objective and resources. As long as it fulfils stakeholder requirements, a project is successful.

  • Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module, you will be able to:
    • Outline the business management framework
    • Summarise the strategic business concepts of forecasting and strategic planning
    • Identify the process of assessing various solutions using cost/benefit analysis
    • Discuss effective leadership and sales techniques for business management
    • Indicate the efficient methodologies to generate viable solutions and motivate innovation
    • Recognise suitable negotiation techniques to ensure a relationship between clients and organisations
    • State the approaches and communication methodologies to improve administrative skills

  • Lesson Summary

    • Business analysis, stakeholder participation, governance, information management, and performance assessment are planning and monitoring goals.
    • Strategy development is frequently a rational, highly planned process, but it may also grow in less organised ways through organisational politics.
    • Porter's Five Forces model focuses on industry competition, supplier power, customer power, new market entrants, and replacement products/services.

    • Effective Communications Tips
